Package tud.iir.classification.page

Class Summary
ClassificationDocument the document representation
ClassificationDocuments An ArrayList of documents.
ClassifierManager This class loads the training and test data, classifies and stores the results.
CombinedClassifier Combine URL and FullPage classification.
DataHelper  
DictionaryClassifier This classifier builds a weighed term look up table for the categories to classify new documents.
FullPageClassifier  
KNNClassifier a concrete KNN classifier
NGram  
NGramIndex  
Preprocessor The preprocessor reads the terms for a given resource and weights them according to their relevance.
TestDocument A test document is a document that has given information about the correct category but is classified using a classifier It is used to determine the accuracy of the classifier.
URLClassifier Classify a web page only by its URL.
URLs an ArrayList of URLs
WebPageClassifier The classifier is an abstract class that provides basic methods used by concrete classifiers.
